document.full_text: scattered clashes broke out across yemen on monday, with three soldiers killed in the north, as military forces were deployed to check nationwide protests demanding the resignation of president ali abdullah saleh.
document.title: violent protests across yemen, 3 soldiers dead
lines_and_colors: scattered clashes broke out across yemen on monday, with three soldiers killed in the north, as military forces were deployed to check nationwide protests demanding the resignation of president ali abdullah saleh.
